name: Sunrise IPA
description: A bright, citrus-forward IPA with a well-balanced bitterness and a refreshing finish.

name: Mountain Stout
description: A rich and creamy stout with notes of roasted coffee and dark chocolate.

name: Riverbend Kolsch
description: A crisp and clean Kolsch with a delicate malt sweetness and subtle hop aroma.

name: Golden Valley Blonde
description: A smooth and approachable blonde ale with hints of honey and light floral hops.

name: Hops & Dreams Double IPA
description: An intensely hopped double IPA with bold tropical fruit flavors and a strong malt backbone.

name: Crafty's Amber Ale
description: A balanced amber ale with caramel malt sweetness and a touch of earthy hop bitterness.

name: Seaside Gose
description: A tart and refreshing gose brewed with sea salt and coriander, perfect for summer sipping.

name: Stonebridge Imperial Stout
description: A bold and complex imperial stout with flavors of dark fruit, roasted malt, and bourbon barrel aging.

name: Hollow Tree Cider
description: A crisp and dry apple cider with just the right amount of sweetness and a refreshing finish.

name: Ironclad Red Ale
description: A smooth and malty red ale with notes of caramel, toffee, and a light roasted finish.

name: Moonlit Hefeweizen
description: A refreshing wheat beer with hints of banana and clove, perfect for warm weather.

name: Steel City Imperial IPA
description: A hop-forward imperial IPA with intense pine, citrus, and resinous hop flavors balanced by a strong malt presence.

name: Canyon River Amber Ale
description: A balanced amber ale with a medium body, caramel sweetness, and a smooth finish.

name: Valley Forge Saison
description: A farmhouse-style ale with fruity esters, peppery phenols, and a dry, crisp finish.

name: Summit Barleywine
description: A strong and malty barleywine with notes of dried fruit, caramel, and warming alcohol.

name: Sunrise Pale Ale
description: A refreshing pale ale with floral hop aromas and a crisp, clean finish.

name: Mountain Peak Porter
description: A smooth and robust porter with notes of chocolate, caramel, and roasted coffee.

name: Riverbend Wheat Beer
description: A light and refreshing wheat beer with a slightly cloudy appearance and hints of citrus.

name: Golden Valley Barleywine
description: A strong and malty barleywine with rich caramel and toffee notes balanced by a subtle hop bitterness.

name: Hops & Dreams Session IPA
description: A low-alcohol IPA that packs a punch with bold hop flavors and a refreshing, light body.

name: Crafty's Brown Ale
description: A rich and nutty brown ale with a medium body and smooth malt finish.

name: Seaside Lager
description: A crisp and clean lager with a smooth malt backbone and a light hop aroma.

name: Stonebridge Pale Ale
description: A well-balanced pale ale with notes of grapefruit and pine, finishing with a light bitterness.

name: Hollow Tree Saison
description: A farmhouse-style ale with fruity esters, peppery phenols, and a dry, crisp finish.

name: Ironclad Porter
description: A rich and smooth porter with deep roasted malt flavors and a hint of chocolate.
